ai-anya-e0105n25:4_2: But when the time was announced at that time, and making a plain down in the morning for the sake of its own advantage and so many reasons, he gave them his reasons and presented them to the subject.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_0: Herein, as some say, the first three kinds of temperament to begin with have their source in previous habit; and they have their source in elements and humours.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_1: Apparently one of greedy temperament has formerly had plenty of desirable tasks and gratifying work to do, or has reappeared here after dying in a heaven.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_2: And one of hating temperament has formerly had plenty of stabbing and torturing and brutal work to do or has reappeared here after dying in one of the hells or the nāga existences.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_3: And one of deluded temperament has formerly drunk a lot of intoxicants and neglected learning and questioning, or has reappeared here after dying in the animal existence. It is in this way that they have their source in previous habit, they say:
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_4: But one of two elements is obstructed by the earth element and the water element.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_5: For the other two he wanders in one of hating temperament.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_6: But he is of greedy temperament because all four are equal.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_7: and one of greedy temperament has wind in excess.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_8: and one of deluded temperament has wind in excess.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_9: Or one of deluded temperament has wind in excessive.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_10: When one of greedy temperament has formerly drunk the aggregates, they say, “Same and acts often reviewing the excessively the aggregates of greedy temperament and hate, or some other of them have done and obsessed them, they all haven’t done the same way.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_11: so there is no such law of prominence of elements as that of in the way already described.
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_12: and only the pair, greed and delusion, are given in the law of humours, and even that subsequently contradicts itself;
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_13: That’s why it should be cut down in purification all around.”
ai-anya-e0105n25:5_15: The great teacher, the highest among men, was said to have great wisdom. “H Kaccāna, Is the path of purification which is the Theras, Kaccāna, Kaccāna, I doing this?”, “The Elders, among the forty-three”, and so on. That is the path of purification for the knowledge of freedom.
